body.p: To his Excellency B Magoffin Governer of Kentucky

The undersigned Petitioner would respectfully state, that Wm D Ratcliffe was fined at the present term the Bracken Circuit Court in four cases for selling spiritous liquors to Minors Fifty Dollars in each case they would say that he is a Hotel keeper in the town Brooksville, and never sells or permits his clerks to sell his clerks to sell any spiritious Liquors to Minors but a in at his house did sell, as the proof was Shows to Minors, once to each in the four cases above refered, and it would ^was^ be done without the knowledge or consent of said Ratcliffe Your petitioner would therefore pray your Excellency to remit said fines so far as is in your power to do
